page.title: 09Road safety in Viewpark
page.content: Because our area of Viewpark had the worst accident record on the roads in the district we did work on it in school. Most of the accidents were to pedestrians and 56% of them were to children. One third of these victims were between 12 and 15. The main road (Old Edinburgh Road) is still very busy even though the Motorway has taken a lot of the traffic away. In the housing scheme are some roads which are bus routes and have lots of vans etc. One which is near to our school is Laburnum Road. This road winds a lot and has many cars parked along it because there is no room for enough garages. It is very dangerous for pedestrians here as it is hard to see the fast traffic.
